repairedDockerfile:

# Default, 64 bit image
# FROM ubuntu:16.04

# 32 bit image
FROM i686/ubuntu

#--------------------
# General setup
#--------------------
# setup environment
ENV LANG C.UTF-8
ENV LC_ALL C.UTF-8

WORKDIR /root
RUN apt-get update
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y binutils \
    gcc gdb && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get update

# Utilities for the hack
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y vim \
  less python3 python wget bsdmainutils && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

#--------------------
# Set up proper (comfortable) gdb environment
#--------------------
RUN wget -P ~ git.io/.gdbinit

#--------------------
# Copy source files
#--------------------
COPY rlibc1.c /root
COPY rlibc2.c /root

#--------------------
# Compile code
#--------------------
RUN gcc rlibc1.c -g -o rlibc1
# Compile without tricks to avoid overflows
RUN gcc rlibc1.c -g -o rlibc1_noprotection -fno-stack-protector -z execstack

RUN gcc rlibc2.c -g -o rlibc2
# Compile without tricks to avoid overflows
RUN gcc rlibc2.c -g -o rlibc2_noprotection -fno-stack-protector -z execstack

#--------------------
# Entry point
#--------------------
CMD ["bash"]
